name: Crimson Resonance
description:
Crimson Recon was a Ludum Dare 40 entry, the game is currently in development under the name Crimson Resonance which is aimed to be released on multiple platforms!

As we are really excited about the project and had a lot of great feedback and an awesome placement (14th Overall!), we’ve decided to develop our LD40 entry into a fully-fledged game! To give you guys a small taste of what’s to come, we have a new small update covering some tweaks and unfolded secrets within the Crimson Cave and City Ruins.

 The Ludum Dare version is still available for downloading!

Updated Post-LD40 version features:

  • Various tweaks like a smaller hitbox, less bullet drop, more clarity, stronger sound feedback and other, slightly more gloomy additions.

Future ideas & goals for the game:

  • More varied chapters to discover, unfolding different atmospheres and challenges to tackle.
  • A tractor-beam that has multifunctional purposes for yet undiscovered reasons.
  • More stuff like bosses and a reworked combo system.

A few inspirations are: Oddworld, R-Type Final, Limbo & Inside.

However, for now we are celebrating and we thank you for playing and testing our LD40 game. We are really proud and keen in continuing this project! If you have any ideas or criticisms, be sure to let us know below!

Enjoy,

Tobias & Meneer Guus
